title: Bloomberg Markets: Manning Says Disruptors Changing Retail
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Manning Says Disruptors Changing Retail
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Brian Manning Chief Executive Officer Centric Digital Discussing the need for retailers to rethink the physical experience and shift to digital for distribution.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
